demo.question: Nancy starts with 91.0 bottle caps . She finds another 88.0 . How many bottle caps does Nancy end with ?
Mary picked 14.0 oranges and Jason picked 41.0 oranges . Keith picked 38.0 apples . How many oranges were picked in all ?

Megan was organizing her book case making sure each of the shelves had exactly 7.0 books on it . If she had 8.0 shelves of mystery books and 2.0 shelves of picture books , how many books did she have total ?
John was trying to expand his game collection . He bought 21.0 games from a friend and bought 8.0 more at a garage sale . If 23.0 of the games did n't work , how many good games did he end up with ?
There are 34.0 dogwood trees currently in the park . Park workers will plant 49.0 more dogwood trees today . How many dogwood trees will the park have when the workers are finished ?
A trivia team had 7.0 members total , but during a game 2.0 members did n't show up . If each member that did show up scored 4.0 points , how many points were scored total ?
Christopher strolled 5.0 miles at 4.0 miles per hour . How long did Christopher stroll ?

For Halloween Katie and her sister combined the candy they received . Katie had 8.0 pieces of candy while her sister had 23.0 . If they ate 8.0 pieces the first night , how many pieces do they have left ?
Tim found 679.0 seashells and 110.0 starfish on the beach . He gave 172.0 of the seashells to Sara . How many seashells does Tim now have ?
a pet store had 64 birds that talked and 13 that did n't . how many birds did the pet store have total ?
Joan has 9.0 blue balloons , Sally has 5.0 blue balloons , and Jessica has 2.0 blue balloons . How many blue balloons do they have in total ?
carol had 81 pieces of paper in her folder . after a week she had 38 left . how many pieces did she use in the week ?
There are 33.0 pencils and 44.0 crayons in the drawer . Joan placed 27.0 pencils in the drawer . How many pencils are now there in total ?
Luke had 48.0 dollars in January . By March he had spent 11.0 dollars . If he got another 21.0 dollars from his mom , how much money would he have ?
Third - grade students went to a concert in 8.0 buses . Each bus took 45.0 students . How many students went to the concert ?
Dan has 64.0 violet marbles , he gave Mary 14.0 of the marbles . How many violet marbles does he now have ?
